name: ICDEV Compliance
description: ATO artifact generation: SSP, POAM, STIG checklists, SBOM, CUI markings, and NIST 800-53 control mapping. Ensures continuous compliance throughout the development lifecycle.

skills.name: Generate SSP
skills.description: Generate a System Security Plan (SSP) with all 17 NIST sections, tailored to the project's system boundary and controls.

skills.name: Generate POAM
skills.description: Generate a Plan of Action and Milestones (POAM) from security findings, with remediation timelines and responsible parties.

skills.name: Check STIG
skills.description: Run STIG checklist evaluation against target systems and generate compliance findings.

skills.name: Generate SBOM
skills.description: Generate a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) in CycloneDX format listing all dependencies.

skills.name: Apply CUI Markings
skills.description: Apply Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) classification markings to files and documents.

skills.name: Map NIST Controls
skills.description: Map NIST 800-53 controls to project implementations and generate a control matrix.
